front.title: Reverse Defect Indicator for MPLS FM OAM

abstract.t: This document describes extensions to the MPLS Fault Management Operations, Administration, and Management (MPLS FM OAM) in RFC 6427 [RFC6427] to support Remote Defect Indication (RDI) functionality. Specifically, it describes a mechanism for propagating MPLS FM OAM messages to the upstream Label Edge Router (LER) in MPLS-TP [RFC5921] bi-directional (associated and co-routed) Label Switched Paths (LSPs).
